content: Set up the limit of unsuccessful login attempts by the user to protect the space against brute-force attacks. When the limit is reached, attempts coming from the associated IP address will be banned for specified period of time, or captcha will be requested if enabled.

comment.text: This translation key describes the description text that appears on a security setting page, explaining how brute-force protection works and its purpose in limiting unsuccessful login attempts to protect against attacks. It informs users about the action taken when the limit is reached (banning or displaying a CAPTCHA).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "حماية المساحة من الاختراقات" (protecting the space from hacking) is not the most accurate translation of "protect the space against brute-force attacks". It's too broad. A more precise translation would convey the concept of brute-force specifically.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بوضع حد لمحاولات تسجيل الدخول غير الناجحة من قبل المستخدم لحماية الحساب من هجمات القوة الغاشمة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "عنوان IP" while technically correct, is a very literal translation of "IP address". Using a more natural phrasing in Arabic would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم حظر المحاولات الواردة من عنوان الشبكة المرتبط

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a complex sentence structure that can be simplified for better readability. Consider breaking it down into shorter, clearer sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بوضع حد لمحاولات تسجيل الدخول غير الناجحة من قبل المستخدم لحماية الحساب. عند الوصول إلى الحد الأقصى، سيتم حظر المحاولات الواردة من عنوان الشبكة المرتبط لفترة زمنية محددة. أو، إذا تم التفعيل، سيتم طلب رمز التحقق.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Set up the limit' is not accurately reflected in the Azerbaijani translation 'təyin edin'. 'Təyin edin' translates to 'define' or 'assign', whereas 'set up' implies configuration. A more appropriate translation would be 'quruluş edin' or 'məhdudiyyəti yaratmaq'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domeni kobud güc hücumlarından qorumaq üçün istifadəçi uğursuz giriş cəhdlərinin məhdudiyyəti yaratmaq/quruluş edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'associated' is not accurately translated. 'Müvafiq' is close, but doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'associated with' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domeni kobud güc hücumlarından qorumaq üçün istifadəçi uğursuz giriş cəhdlərinin məhdudiyyəti yaratmaq/quruluş edin. Limitə çatdıqdan sonra həmin IP ünvanından cəhdlər müəyyən müddətə qadağan ediləcək və ya aktiv olduqda captcha tələb olunacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "пространството" (the space) in the Bulgarian translation is a bit vague. It doesn't clearly convey what is being protected. It should be more specific, like "системата" (the system) or "акаунтите" (the accounts).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Настройте лимита на неуспешните опити за влизане от потребителя, за да защитите системата/акаунтите срещу атаки с груба сила.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be improved for readability.  Consider splitting it into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Настройте лимита на неуспешните опити за влизане от потребителя, за да защитите системата/акаунтите срещу атаки с груба сила. Когато лимитът бъде достигнат, опитите, идващи от свързания IP адрес, ще бъдат забранени за определен период от време или ще бъде поискана captcha, ако е активирана.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a long sentence structure which can be difficult to parse. Consider breaking it into two shorter sentences for improved readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte limit neúspěšných pokusů o přihlášení uživatele pro ochranu prostoru před útoky hrubou silou. Po dosažení limitu budou pokusy přicházející z přidružené IP adresy zakázány na zadanou dobu, nebo bude vyžadován captcha, pokud je povolena.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ωμής βίας' (omees vias) translates to 'raw force' which isn't the best fit for 'brute-force attacks'. A more accurate translation would be 'αριθμητική βία' (arithmitiki via) or 'μεθοδική βία' (methodiki via).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ρυθμίστε το όριο των ανεπιτυχών προσπαθειών σύνδεσης του χρήστη για την προστασία του χώρου από επιθέσεις αριθμητικής βίας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'σχετική διεύθυνση IP' (schetiki dieuthynsi IP) is not the most natural way to express 'associated IP address'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ρυθμίστε το όριο των ανεπιτυχών προσπαθειών σύνδεσης του χρήστη για την προστασία του χώρου από επιθέσεις αριθμητικής βίας. Όταν επιτευχθεί το όριο, οι προσπάθειες που προέρχονται από την αντίστοιχη διεύθυνση IP θα απαγορεύονται για καθορισμένο χρονικό διάστημα ή θα ζητείται captcha, εάν είναι ενεργοποιημένο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "väsytyshyökkäyksiltä" (fatigue attacks) is not the most common or accurate translation for "brute-force attacks". A more suitable term would be "raaka voimahyökkäykset" or "pakotetut hyökkäykset".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta epäonnistuneiden sisäänkirjautumisyritysten raja suojautuaksesi raakaa voimaa käyttävillä hyökkäyksillä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kyseisistä IP-osoitteista" could be more natural. "Näistä IP-osoitteista" is a better alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta epäonnistuneiden sisäänkirjautumisyritysten raja suojautuaksesi raakaa voimaa käyttävillä hyökkäyksillä. Kun raja on saavutettu, yritykset, jotka tulevat näistä IP-osoitteista kielletään tietyksi ajaksi tai captcha pyydetään, jos se on käytössä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) after the introductory phrase 'տարածքը կոպիտ ուժի հարձակումներից պաշտպանելու համար:' which is not consistent with typical English sentence structure and can make the sentence feel slightly awkward. Consider removing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: տարածքը կոպիտ ուժի հարձակումներից պաշտպանելու համար տարածքի օգտատիրոջ կողմից մուտքի անհաջող փորձերի սահմանը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'կարգելվեն որոշակի ժամանակահատվածով' (will be banned for a specific period of time) might be too strong. Depending on the system, a less restrictive term like 'թողարկվեն' (be delayed/temporarily blocked) or 'արգելափակվեն ժամանակավորապես' (be temporarily blocked) might be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: արգելափակվեն ժամանակավորապես

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses a full stop at the end of the first sentence. While grammatically correct, it doesn't match the flow and style of similar descriptions, which often omit the full stop in technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the full stop at the end of the first sentence: 「ブルートフォース攻撃からスペースを保護するために、ユーザーによるログイン試行失敗の制限を設定します。」

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'space' in the English content is not accurately translated. 'Space' likely refers to an online account or system. '공간' (gonggan) can mean space, but a better translation would be something like '계정' (gyejeong - account) or '시스템' (siseutem - system).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 무차별 대입 공격으로부터 계정/시스템을 보호하기 위해 사용자의 로그인 시도 실패 횟수 제한을 설정하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation could benefit from more natural Korean phrasing. The sentence structure feels a little clunky when directly translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 무차별 대입 공격으로부터 보호하기 위해, 사용자의 로그인 시도 실패 횟수 제한을 설정하세요. 제한에 도달하면 해당 IP 주소에서 비롯된 시도가 지정된 기간 동안 차단되거나, 캡차 활성화 시 캡차가 요청됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "brute-force attacks" is translated as "ການໂຈມຕີດ້ວຍແຮງກ້າ." While understandable, a more accurate and common translation would be "ການໂຈມຕີແບບໃຊ້ກຳລັງ" or "ການໂຈມຕີແບບບັງຄັບ". "ແຮງກ້າ" implies raw strength rather than the repeated automated attempts characteristic of brute-force attacks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການໂຈມຕີແບບໃຊ້ກຳລັງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "associated IP address" is translated as "ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ."  While technically correct, a more natural and fluent translation would be "ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽນພັນ" or simply "ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ນັ້ນ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽນພັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the use of full stops at the end of each sentence feels somewhat stiff in Lao.  A more natural flow might omit some.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing some of the full stops for a more conversational tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vieta' (place) in the Latvian translation doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'space' in the English context. It should refer to the system or account being protected.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet lietotāja neveiksmīgo pieteikšanās mēģinājumu ierobežojumu, lai aizsargātu sistēmu/kontu pret rupja spēka uzbrukumiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'internet protocol (IP) address' as 'interneta protokola (IP) adrese' is overly literal and sounds unnatural. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet lietotāja neveiksmīgo pieteikšanās mēģinājumu ierobežojumu, lai aizsargātu sistēmu/kontu pret rupja spēka uzbrukumiem. Kad limits ir sasniegts, mēģinājumi, kas nāk no attiecīgās IP adreses, tiks aizliegti uz noteiktu laiku vai tiks pieprasīts Captcha, ja tas ir iespējots.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'attiecīgās IP adreses' is a bit clunky. Consider streamlining.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet lietotāja neveiksmīgo pieteikšanās mēģinājumu ierobežojumu, lai aizsargātu sistēmu/kontu pret rupja spēka uzbrukumiem. Kad limits ir sasniegts, mēģinājumi, kas nāk no IP adreses, tiks aizliegti uz noteiktu laiku vai tiks pieprasīts Captcha, ja tas ir iespējots.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de ruimte" (the space) is not the best translation for "the space" in this context. It implies a physical space rather than an account or system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more accurate translation like "het account" (the account) or "het systeem" (the system).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “bijbehorende IP-adres” could be more naturally phrased. The implication is the IP address associated with the unsuccessful attempts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider phrasing like “het IP-adres waar de pogingen vandaan komen” or “het IP-adres dat gebruikt wordt voor de pogingen.”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a semicolon (';') where a comma (',') might be more common and natural in this context. While a semicolon is grammatically correct, a comma would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustaw limit nieudanych prób logowania przez użytkownika, aby chronić obszar przed atakami brute force, próby pochodzące z powiązanego adresu IP zostaną zablokowane na określony czas lub pojawi się kod CAPTCHA, jeśli zostanie włączony.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses a passive voice construction ('vor fi interzise' - will be banned) which is less direct and potentially less clear than a more active voice. While grammatically correct, it could be improved for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to a more active voice, such as 'adresa IP asociată va fi blocată' (the associated IP address will be blocked).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'validarea de tip captcha' is a literal translation of 'captcha verification' and is slightly awkward. While understandable, it's not the most natural way to express it in Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'validarea de tip captcha' with 'un test CAPTCHA' or 'un sistem CAPTCHA'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "corresponding IP address" ("соответствующего IP-адреса") is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "IP-адрес, с которого поступают попытки" or similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IP-адрес, с которого поступают попытки

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'captcha' is directly transliterated as 'код проверки'. While understandable, it's more common to use the English term 'captcha' in Russian technical contexts or provide a more accurate explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: captcha (код подтверждения)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'අදාළ අ.ජා.කෙ. (IP) ලිපිනය' is a somewhat clunky way to refer to the IP address.  While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala. The abbreviation 'අ.ජා.කෙ.' is also not commonly understood by all users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයා උත්සාහ කරන IP ලිපිනය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses around 'IP' within the Sinhala translation disrupt the flow. It's unnatural to include the abbreviation and English term in parentheses like that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයා උත්සාහ කරන IP ලිපිනය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වාර' (waar) translates to 'times' or 'rounds' but in this context, 'attempts' is more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයා උත්සාහ කිරීමට හැකි වාර ගණන සීමා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'protect the space' is translated as 'na ochranu priestoru'. While technically correct, 'priestor' (space) feels slightly awkward in this context. A more natural Slovak phrasing might be 'na ochranu účtu/systému' (to protect the account/system) or 'na ochranu tohto systému' (to protect this system).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavenie limitu neúspešných pokusov o prihlásenie používateľa na ochranu účtu/systému.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'brute-force attacks' is translated as 'napadi z vdorom'. While technically correct, a more common and natural translation would be 'brutalne sile' or 'sileva napada'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'brute-force attacks' as 'brutalne sile' or 'sileva napada'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses a comma after 'dosežena', which might not be grammatically necessary or typical in this context. It disrupts the flow slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the comma after 'dosežena' for better readability (Ko je omejitev dosežena, ...)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'brute-force' is not italicized or in any special formatting as it is in the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите ограничење неуспешних покушаја пријављивања од стране корисника како бисте заштитили простор од напада *brute-force*.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'space' is translated as 'простор'. While technically correct, it might be better to use a more contextually appropriate term depending on what 'space' refers to in the original text. A more accurate rendering might be 'налог' (account) or 'система' (system).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите ограничење неуспешних покушаја пријављивања од стране корисника како бисте заштитили *налог/система* од напада *brute-force*.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'CAPTCHA' is an English loanword and should ideally be transliterated or replaced with a Serbian equivalent, if one exists and is commonly understood. While its use is understandable, maintaining consistency and clarity for all Serbian speakers is beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: CAPTCHA could be replaced with 'test za proveru da li ste čovek' or a similar explanatory phrase, or kept as 'CAPTCHA' if the audience is familiar with the term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'povezane IP adrese' (associated IP address) might be slightly ambiguous. It's unclear if it refers to the IP address used *during* the login attempt or an IP address assigned to the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'IP adresa sa koje se vrši pokušaj prijave' (IP address from which the login attempt is made) for improved clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'specified period of time' is translated as 'belirli bir süre boyunca'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and could be improved for better flow in Turkish. A more natural phrasing might be 'belirtilen süre boyunca'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: belirtilen süre boyunca

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'captcha' is directly transliterated. While understood by some, a more common and clearer equivalent in Turkish might be 'güvenlik doğrulama testi' or a simplified version like 'doğrulama testi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: doğrulama testi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma (,) before 'або' which is grammatically incorrect. It should be a period (.)
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Установіть ліміт невдалих спроб входу користувача, щоб захистити простір від атак грубою силою. Коли ліміт буде досягнуто, спроби, що надходять із пов’язаної IP-адреси, будуть заблоковані протягом певного періоду часу. Або, якщо ввімкнено, запитуватиметься капча.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "không gian" (space) in the translation feels slightly off in this context. While technically correct, "không gian" often refers to physical space. A more suitable word would be "tài khoản" (account) or "hệ thống" (system).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thiết lập giới hạn số lần đăng nhập không thành công của người dùng để bảo vệ tài khoản/hệ thống khỏi các cuộc tấn công brute-force.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period after "brute-force". The English source also has this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Keep the period after 'brute-force' as it is consistent with the source text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '暴力攻击' (violent attack) is a common translation for brute-force attack, but 'brute-force attack' is more precise and maintains terminology consistency.  While understandable, it slightly deviates from the English meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 设置登录失败次数限制，保护空间免遭暴力破解攻击 (Set up the limit of unsuccessful login attempts to protect the space against brute-force attacks).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'associated IP address' as '关联 IP 地址' is accurate, but the sentence structure could be improved for clarity and flow in Chinese. '来自关联 IP 地址的尝试' is slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 达到指定限制时，来自相关 IP 地址的尝试将被禁止 (When the limit is reached, attempts from the related IP address will be banned).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '所选时间段' (selected time period) is a bit vague and doesn't directly reflect the English phrasing 'specified period of time'. It implies a selectable option rather than a defined period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 达到指定限制时，来自相关 IP 地址的尝试将被禁止在规定时间内 (When the limit is reached, attempts from the related IP address will be banned for a specified period).
